name: Karate Do Fighting Tiger 3D - 2
description:
Try Karate Do Fighting Tiger 3D – 2 — the second part of ultimate action fighting game! Join the world of Japanese martial arts once again! War of best fighters continues! Survive on the ring leaving your opponent no chance to stay alive! Participate another karate fighting tournament, beat all your opponents and become the best warrior here! Try to use not only karate style, but also Judo Taekwondo, MuayThai, Kung Fu, Boxing, WWE.

Check contest and survival mode – fight against enemies and kill them to earn points or survive on the ring as long as you can! Become the strongest fighter on the earth playing Karate Fighting Tiger 3D - 2 action game!
Play Karate Do Fighting Tiger 3D – 2 and become the master of Tiger Claw style, improve your fighting skills and be the best combatant in the known world!

It’s time to face and beat new opponents and prove your mastery over a Karate Tiger Claw Style playing amazing Karate Do Fighting Tiger 3D – 2! Your enemies use different fighting styles including Taekwondo, Muay Thai, Kung Fu, Boxing and other, so do your best to overcome all of them with the power of karate Tiger Claw style! Level up your fighting skills with each level! Fight against powerful rivals, win over them, earn points and buy new colored belts to unlock new levels of your progression! Upgrade your power, speed, and accuracy or unlock new strikes and fighting styles getting points for each winning!

Karate Do Fighting Tiger 3D – 2 features:

- Upgraded variation of the ultimate action fighting game in Japanese style
- Opportunity to level up or customize your assassin’s skills
- More cool strikes, punches and fighting styles to try
- Two game modes: contest and survival modes
- New powerful enemies to battle against and revenge
- Colored belts would upgrade your martial artist’s skills

Welcome to the sequel of famous action fighting game ‘bout karate - Karate Do Fighting Tiger 3D – 2! Become a real master of Japanese martial artist, win the tournament and just have fun!
